00075 
00076 void csyr2k(char uplo, char trans,
00077                    int n, int k,
00078                    complex alpha, complex *a, int lda,
00079            complex *b, int ldb,
00080            complex beta, complex *c, int ldc)
00081 {
00082   complex betaC;
00083 
00084   csyr2kInternal(uplo, trans, n, k, alpha, a,
00085                   lda, b, ldb, beta, c, ldc);
00086 
00087   betaC.r = (real) 1.0;
00088   betaC.i = (real) 0.0;
00089   csyr2kInternal(uplo, trans, n, k, alpha, b,
00090                   ldb, a, lda, betaC, c, ldc);
00091 }
